Life Drawing

Drawing from life may seem to lose meaning when our phones and cameras at our finger tips. Why spend hours to depict someone's exact likeness when it can be done within moments? However, drawing from life allows viewers to see the artist's perspective in a unique way that photo technology cannot, and I think thats pretty cool.
